user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a product page on Amazon for the 2020 Apple MacBook Air. The product title describes the laptop's specifications: Apple M1 Chip, 13" Retina Display, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD Storage, and other features like a backlit keyboard and Touch ID. Below the title is the product rating with 13,312 reviews and a "Climate Pledge Friendly" label. A product image of the MacBook Air is displayed at the bottom, showing the device from the front. The search bar at the top shows "macbook air," and the user is viewing it from the Netherlands.
